scripts.build: node scripts/use-schema.js && node scripts/generate-icons.js && prisma generate && next build
scripts.postinstall: node scripts/use-schema.js && node scripts/generate-icons.js && prisma generate
scripts.start: node scripts/use-schema.js && npx prisma db push && next start
scripts.db:generate: node scripts/use-schema.js && node scripts/generate-icons.js && prisma generate
scripts.render:start: mkdir -p /data && node scripts/use-schema.js && npx prisma db push && npm start
